ArgumentException.summary: If the arguments are not correct.

ArgumentNullException.summary: If something is null which must be set.

DracoonApiException.summary:
Signals a DRACOON REST API error.
The exception stores an error code which can be used to determine the error cause.

ErrorCode.summary: Describes what caused the error. See also

DracoonApiExceptionConstructorOne.summary: Constructs a new exception with an unknown error code.

DracoonApiExceptionConstructorTwo.summary: Constructs a new exception with a specified error code.

DracoonNetIOExceptionConstructorOne.summary: Constructs a new network IO exception without any additional informations.

DracoonNetIOExceptionConstructorTwo.summary: Constructs a new network IO exception with the specified error message.

DracoonNetIOExceptionConstructorThree.summary: Constructs a new network IO exception with the specified error message and the causing exception.

DracoonNetInsecureExceptionConstructorOn.summary: Constructs a new insecure network exception without any additional informations.

DracoonNetInsecureExceptionConstructorTw.summary: Constructs a new insecure network exception with the specified error message.

DracoonNetInsecureExceptionConstructorTh.summary: Constructs a new insecure network exception with the specified error message and the causing exception.

DracoonFileIOExceptionConstructorOne.summary: Constructs a new IO exception without any additional informations.

DracoonFileIOExceptionConstructorTwo.summary: Constructs a new IO exception with the specified error message.

DracoonFileIOExceptionConstructorThree.summary: Constructs a new IO exception with the specified error message and the causing exception.

DracoonExceptionConstructorOne.summary: Constructs a new exception without any additional informations.

DracoonExceptionConstructorTwo.summary: Constructs a new exception with the specified error message.

DracoonExceptionConstructorThree.summary: Constructs a new exception with the specified error message and the causing exception.

DracoonCryptoException.summary:
Signals a DRACOON crypto error.
The exception stores an error code which can be used to determine the error cause.

ErrorCode.summary: Describes what caused the error. See also

DracoonCryptoExceptionConstructorOne.summary: Constructs a new exception with an unkown error code.

DracoonCryptoExceptionConstructorTwo.summary: Constructs a new exception with a specified error code.

DracoonCryptoExceptionConstructorThree.summary: Constructs a new exception with a specified error code and cause.

DracoonApiCode.summary: Collection of DRACOON API error codes.

ToString.summary: Creates a string which contains the error number and the error message.

DracoonCryptoCode.summary: Collection of DRACOON Crypto error codes.

ToString.summary: Creates a string which contains the error number and the error message.
